meta.content: Community Unit School District #2, Robinson, Illinois, Robinson High School, Nuttall Middle School, Lincoln Grade School, Washington Elementary School, Maroons, Robinson Maroons, RHS, NMS, LGS, WES, Washington, Nuttall, Lincoln, Unit 2, School District, Maroon is a Winner, Robinson, IL, 62454

meta.name: description
meta.content: Robinson Community Unit #2 is located in Robinson, Illinois. Robinson High School, Nuttall Middle School, Lincoln Grade School, and Washington Elementary School make up Community Unit School District #2.
meta.title: Robinson Schools - Home

div.p: Community Unit School District #2 schools will be closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.
div.div:
Gmail Accounts: Students should be checking their Gmail accounts on a regular basis. See our Login Guides or contact the Help Desk for additional help.
Remote Learning (updated April 15, 2020): Please see the Remote Learning Information page for important information about the district's remote learning plan and instructions on picking up materials.
Online Resources (updated April 15, 2020): We have compiled a list of Online Resources to use while schools are closed.

div.div:
Read Aloud (updated daily): Special guest readers will be sharing a new story every day in our Read Aloud series.
Coping: Several staff members from Lincoln Grade School remind students of some coping strategies they can use.

br.p: Posted on April 15, 2020 Good afternoon Robinson CUSD#2 Families, We will have a second pick up day for remote learning materials this Friday, April 17 from 9:00AM-12:00. Packets will be available for all students attending Washington Elementary School and Lincoln Elementary School. [ ... ]

Updated on March 30, 2020 Good morning Robinson CUSD#2 Families, I want to first say that all of us at the Robinson CUSD#2 schools miss our students very much and are saddened that their school experience has been interrupted in this way. We know that this is a challenging time for all [ ... ]

This video was created by Lincoln Grade School Counselor Amber Ramsey and several members of the Lincoln staff reminding students of some of the coping strategies they can use. Headspace.com Stop, Breath & Think Smiling Mind GoNo [ ... ]

Google (Gmail, Drive, Classroom & more) Robinson Community Unit School District #2 uses Google's G Suite for Education and Google Chromebooks. Students can access their Google accounts from home on various devices. Students in grades 3-12 have robinsonschools.com Google accounts. Th [ ... ]

Technology Help: We understand that not all of our families have access to devices or Internet service needed for online learning and this is no way required to participate in Remote Learning. However, if you are using technology and you have challenges, you may send a message for assistance to [ ... ]

Updated on April 8, 2020 Thank you to all who are utilizing our Food Distribution Program. We are happy that so many of you are participating. I wanted to make you aware of the Food Distribution/Delivery schedule for the next few days. Tomorrow, Thursday April 9 we will [ ... ]
